mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : FVRT_ASCT.select */ SELECT USER_ID /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , ASCT_ID /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */ , REG_USER_ID /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , REG_DTTM /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */ , UPT_USER_ID /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , UPT_DTTM /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ FROM FVRT_ASCT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ AND ASCT_ID = #{asctId} /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : FVRT_ASCT.insert */ INSERT INTO FVRT_ASCT ( USER_ID /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , ASCT_ID /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */
, REG_USER_ID /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, REG_DTTM /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */
, UPT_USER_ID /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, UPT_DTTM /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ ) VALUES ( #{userId} /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , #{asctId} /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */
, #{regUserId} /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */
, #{uptUserId} /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : FVRT_ASCT.update */ UPDATE FVRT_ASCT
, UPT_USER_ID = #{uptUserId} /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, UPT_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */
WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ AND ASCT_ID = #{asctId} /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : FVRT_ASCT.merge */ INSERT INTO FVRT_ASCT ( USER_ID /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , ASCT_ID /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */
, REG_USER_ID /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, REG_DTTM /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */
, UPT_USER_ID /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, UPT_DTTM /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ ) VALUES ( #{userId} /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ , #{asctId} /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */
, #{regUserId} /* REG_USER_ID 등록_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* REG_DTTM 등록_일시 char(14) */
, #{uptUserId} /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */ ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
, UPT_USER_ID = #{uptUserId} /* UPT_USER_ID 수정_사용자_ID varchar(50) */
, UPT_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /* UPT_DTTM 수정_일시 char(14) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : FVRT_ASCT.delete */ DELETE FROM FVRT_ASCT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} /* USER_ID 사용자_ID varchar(50) */ AND ASCT_ID = #{asctId} /* ASCT_ID AS센터_ID varchar(10) */
